data.text: Yahweh, you who lead us like a shepherd leads his flock of sheep,
Show yourself to the people of the tribes of Ephraim and Benjamin and Manasseh!
God, cause our nation to be strong like it was before;
Yahweh, you who are the commander of the armies of heaven,
It is as though the only food and drink that you have given us is a cup full of our tears!
You have allowed the people-groups that surround us to fight with each other to decide which part of our land each of them will take;
God, commander of the armies of heaven,
Our ancestors were like a grapevine [MET] that you brought out of Egypt;
Like people clear ground to plant a grapevine [MET],
Like huge grapevines cover the hills with their shade
your people ruled all of Canaan, from the Mediterranean Sea in the west to the Euphrates River in the east.
So why have you abandoned us
and wild pigs can trample the vines,
You who are the commander of the armies of heaven, ◄turn to/stop abandoning► us!
who are like the young vine that you [SYN] planted and caused to grow!
Our enemies have torn down and burned everything in our land;
But strengthen us people whom you have chosen [IDM],
When you do that, we will never turn away from you again;
Yahweh, commander of the armies of heaven, restore us;
